long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SawKhan provides an intuitive way to solve math problems on the Khan Academy website. Through mapping Khan Academy's API and handling various problem types, SawKhan can take on any practice quiz! Besides also providing a simple way to assist with math problems, SawKhan also integrates seamlessly into the KhanAcademy website, you won't even notice a difference on the website!
